thread.title: Tottenham Hotspur lose Nacer Chadli for six weeks
thread.title_full: Tottenham Hotspur lose Nacer Chadli for six weeks

author: paulmbanks
title: Tottenham Hotspur lose Nacer Chadli for six weeks
text:
Tweet 
Tottenham Hotspur, currently in seventh place in the Premier League table, are riding a significant hot streak right now. Across all competitions, they have lost just once in their last seven. That momentum has taken a bit of a hit today though with the announcement that winger Nacer Chadli will be gone for the next six weeks with an ankle injury. 
A club statement revealed that he suffered ankle ligament damage this past weekend. THFC also said that the recovery time would be around six weeks. Spurs take on Anderlecht in Europa League on Thursday, and then face Bournemouth on Saturday in their next Premier League fixture. 
White Hart Laneâ€™s time table would have Chadli missing out on seven matches across all competitions.
